title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 117 - Waiver Of Abandoned Property Publication Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 117 - Waiver Of Abandoned Property Publication Requirements

State Regulations
§ 117.1 - Waiver of publication requirements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 117

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, § 8[14]; Abandoned

Property Law, §§302, 601, 702, 1316, 1411, 1414

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
